metadata.description: The name of the solution that you want to create.  It will be located at {siteName}.azurewebsites.net
Specifies the object ID of the service principal in your Azure Active Directory tenant.  You can obtain it using Get-AzADServicePrincipal cmdlet.
User name for the Linux Virtual Machine.

A User password for the Linux Virtual Machines, must between 12 and 72 characters long and have 3 of the following: 1 uppercase character, 1 lowercase character, 1 number and 1 special character that is not slash (\) or dash (-)
Username for the IoT Edge virtual machine
Password for the IoT Edge virtual machine
The SSL PFX certficate used to secure the Application Gateway connection to the VM as base64 encoded string.
The SSL PFX certficate password.
Specifies the registered service application identifier (GUID) in your Azure Active Directory tenant.
Specifies the registered client application identifier (GUID) in your Azure Active Directory tenant.
The registered client application secret.
Url of the Authority (example: https://login.microsoftonline.com/)
Optional Audience value to validate the token audience field against.
Optional Issuer value to validate received tokens against.
The name of the storage account created as part of the deployment.
The storage SKU to use.
Suffix added to Azure Storage hostname.
The name of the Azure Cosmos DB instance created as part of the deployment.
The Azure Cosmos DB default consistency level for the account.
When Azure Cosmos DB consistency level is set to BoundedStaleness, then this value is required, otherwise it can be ignored.
When Azure Cosmos DB consistencyLevel is set to BoundedStaleness, then this value is required, otherwise it can be ignored.
The name of the Azure Service Bus created as part of the deployment.
The Azure Service Bus SKU Tier to use.
The name of the Event Hub namespace created as part of the deployment.
The name of the Event Hub created as part of the deployment.
The event hub message retention in days.
The event hub partition count.
The Azure Event Hub SKU Tier.
The Azure Event Hub SKU Capacity to use.
The name of the Authorization Rule Name for the Event Hub endpoint.
Suffix added to Service Bus endpoint

Name of the Azure Time Series Insights environment created as part of the deployment. The name cannot include: '<', '>', '%', '&', ':', '\', '?', '/' and any control characters. All other characters are allowed.
The Azure Time Series Insights SKU name.
The Azure Time Series Insights SKU capacity to use.
The Azure Time Series Insights environment.
An optional friendly name to show in Azure Time Series tooling or user interfaces instead of the environment name.
An optional friendly name to show in Azure Time Series tooling or user interfaces for the event source.
The name of the signalR endpoint created as part of the deployment.
The Azure SignalR Service SKU Tier to use.
The Azure SignalR Service SKU to use.
The Azure SignalR SKU Capacity
The name of Azure IoT Hub created as part of the deployment.
The Azure IoT Hub SKU to use.
The Azure IoT Hub tier to use.
The Azure IoT Hub default endpoint partition count.
The resource name of the KeyVault created as part of the deployment.
The KeyVault SKU to use.
Specifies the name of the Azure Log Analytics workspace created as part of the deployment.
Specifies the service tier of the Azure Log Analytics workspace.
Specifies the name of Azure Application Insights instance created as part of the deployment.
The Azure Application Insights Prices code.  1 = Per GB (Basic), 2 = Per Node (Enterprise).
Specifies Azure Application Insights daily quota in GB.
Specifies Azure Application Insights daily quota reset hour in UTC (0 to 23). Values outside the range will get a random reset hour.
Specifies Azure Application Insights % value of daily quota after which warning mail to be sent.
The name of the Linux Virtual Machine created as part of the deployment.
The size of the Virtual Machine.
The Ubuntu version for the Virtual Machine.
The branch from which to procure scripts during VM initialization.
An optional prefix defining the registry and path of the micro services and modules that should be deployed.

resources.comments: KeyVault Premium Sku for secrets and certificate store.
resources.name: [parameters('keyVaultName')]

resources.comments: KeyVault service principal permissions.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('keyVaultName'), '/replace')]

resources.comments: Azure IoT Hub
resources.name: [parameters('iotHubName')]

resources.comments: Telemetry Consumer Group of IoT Hub
resources.name: [concat(parameters('iotHubName'), '/events/', variables('iothubConsumerGroup1'))]

resources.comments: Events Consumer Group of IoT Hub
resources.name: [concat(parameters('iotHubName'), '/events/', variables('iothubConsumerGroup2'))]

resources.comments: Storage account
resources.name: [parameters('storageName')]

resources.comments: Azure CosmosDb
resources.name: [parameters('cosmosDbName')]

resources.comments: Azure Service Bus Namespace
resources.name: [parameters('serviceBusNamespaceName')]

resources.comments: Azure Event Hub Namespace
resources.name: [parameters('eventHubNamespaceName')]

resources.comments: Azure Event Hub for Device Telemetry
resources.name: [concat(parameters('eventHubNamespaceName'), '/', parameters('eventHubName'))]

resources.comments: Event Hub Authorization for Device Telemetry Consumers
resources.name: [concat(parameters('eventHubNamespaceName'), '/', parameters('eventHubName'), '/', parameters('eventHubAuthorizationName'))]

resources.comments: Timeseries Insights Environment
resources.name: [parameters('tsiEnvironmentName')]

resources.comments: Timeseries Insights Device Telemetry Event Hub Event Source
resources.name: [concat(parameters('tsiEnvironmentName'), '/', variables('tsiEventSourceName'))]

resources.comments: AppService plan to host the Application Gateway Web App
resources.name: [variables('hostingPlanName')]

resources.comments: Application Gateway certificate
resources.name: [variables('appGatewayCertificateName')]

resources.comments: Application Gateway Web App
resources.name: [parameters('siteName')]

resources.comments: Security rules used for the VM network interface
resources.name: [variables('networkSecurityGroupName')]

resources.comments: Network interface used by the VM
resources.name: [variables('nicName')]

resources.comments: VM running the microservices
resources.name: [parameters('vmName')]

resources.comments: One time script execution to prepare the VM environment
resources.name: [concat(parameters('vmName'), '/', 'scriptextensions')]
